entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:30 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 5:57 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:29 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. High plus 1. Forecast issued 5:29 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
